name: Torpedo
additionalNotes: JB Selection Cigars are a toothy, dark brown wrapper is flawlessly wrapped around a filler blend that incorporates a beautiful Cuban-seed Corojo Habano leaf. The JB Selection Cigars burn and drawis perfect, delivering an abundance of sensationally sweet smoke on the full side of medium-bodied. JB Selection Cigars have a even with some power behind it, the JB Selection Cigars are arare Corojo Habano remains the star, revealing well-balanced notes of spice and an equally seductive aroma.
